name: Astro (itch) (Hati02)
description:
Astro is my first prototype mobile game, still in development, where  you have to help the protagonist (white square) to get back to It's planet (the yellow planet). 

It's a "one touch" game where you have to throw the protagosist like a "sling" and in order for it to reach It's planet you have to use the gravitational force fields of other planets to rederect It's path but be careful not to hit the planets or being attract by a black hole ! 

There is only three levels, I might add more afterward.

If you have trouble with the sling, try the "centered view" It should be easier to manipulate It.
